title: AHORA: Planeta Tierra
overview: Planeta Tierra features in-depth coverage and analysis, investigative reports and on-the-ground reporting from cities across the United States and the Americas. It will include newsmaker interviews and thought-provoking conversations with innovators spearheading creative solutions to address the impact of today's changing climate.The weekly program will also feature regular contributions from Chief Meteorologist Carlos Robles and special reports from Telemundo local stations.
